provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Airports Authority (Public
Parking Places) (Norman Manley International Airport) Regulations, 2004.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. In these Regulations-
      "airport" means the Sangster International Airport, Montego Bay, St.
           James;
      "attendant" means any person appointed by the Authority, pursuant to
           regulation 3, to be an attendant at a parking place;
      "authority" means the Airports Authority of Jamaica and includes any
           other person or entity who has entered into arrangements with the
           Airports Authority with the approval of the Minister to operate
           the airport or parts thereof as an approved airport operator
           pursuant to section 4 of the Airports (Economic Regulation) Act;
      "concessionaire" means any person or entity contracted by the
           Authority for the operation of public car park facilities at the
           airport;
      "fee-paying parking place" means any parking place designated by the
           Authority, under regulation 5 (I), as a parking place in respect of
           which fees are payable;
      "parking place" means any portion of the airport appointed by the
           Authority under regulation 3 where members of the public may
           park motor vehicles;
      "parking spot" means a spot within a parking place reserved for the
           parking of only one motor vehicle.
